text: Barbara McAlister is an American diver. She won a gold medal in springboard diving at the 1963 Pan American Games in São Paulo.Pan American Games - Diving Medalists hickoksports.com (Retrieved on 6 December 2008) She was featured on the cover of the magazine Sports Illustrated July 23, 1962 (Volume 17, Issue 4). ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American female divers Category:University of Arizona alumni Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Pan American Games medalists in diving Category:Divers at the 1963 Pan American Games
title: Barbara McAlister
